test_input: Generate a 3-slide professional intro pitch presentation for TestCorp, a Technology company. Key pain points: slow deployments, high downtime. Products: CloudSync Platform. Tone: Professional.

result.text:
Your 3-slide professional intro pitch presentation for TestCorp, a Technology company, has been created. The presentation covers key pain points (slow deployments, high downtime) and introduces the CloudSync Platform as the solution, with a clean, professional design and speaker notes.

You can download the PowerPoint file below:

[TestCorp_Intro_Pitch.pptx](sandbox:/tmp/testcorp_intro_pitch.pptx)

response.message:
Your 3-slide professional intro pitch presentation for TestCorp, a Technology company, has been created. The presentation covers key pain points (slow deployments, high downtime) and introduces the CloudSync Platform as the solution, with a clean, professional design and speaker notes.

You can download the PowerPoint file below:

[TestCorp_Intro_Pitch.pptx](sandbox:/tmp/testcorp_intro_pitch.pptx)

field_types.module_outputs: array (optional, contains file URLs when code_interpreter produces files)
field_types.raw_response: string (full text from agent including sandbox file links)

response_format_notes: This agent uses code_interpreter to execute Python code with python-pptx. It returns a text response describing the presentation and a sandbox file link. When the Lyzr API returns module_outputs, those contain downloadable HTTPS URLs for the generated PPTX files. The UI extracts file URLs from module_outputs first, then falls back to parsing sandbox/HTTPS links from the raw text response.
